# SubscriptionReactivateItem

**Object**

An item in a subscription to reactive.

## Declaration

```swift
object SubscriptionReactivateItem
```

## Discussion

This object is part of the [doc://com.apple.advancedcommerceapi/documentation/AdvancedCommerceAPI/SubscriptionReactivateInAppRequest] that your app uses to reactivate a subscription that would otherwise expire.

## Subscription reactivation in the app

- **SubscriptionReactivateInAppRequest**: The request your app provides to reactivate a subscription that has automatic renewal turned off.
